activities.title: Peek-a-boo with a blanket
activities.description: Classic hiding and revealing game that delights babies
instructions: 1. Hold a blanket between you and your baby
activities.safetyNotes: Always remove blanket immediately after play
activities.parentTips: Use high-contrast fabrics for visual interest

activities.title: Stacking cups
activities.description: Building and knocking down colorful towers
activities.safetyNotes: Ensure cups are large enough to prevent choking
activities.parentTips: Start with just 3-4 cups for beginners

activities.title: Blanket ride
activities.description: Gentle pulling on a blanket for movement fun
activities.safetyNotes: Only on smooth floors without obstacles
activities.parentTips: Kneel to maintain control at baby's level

activities.title: Bubble chasing
activities.description: Popping floating bubbles for visual tracking fun
activities.parentTips: Blow downward so bubbles stay in reach

activities.title: Rolling ball
activities.parentTips: Start with very short distances

activities.title: Nature walk
activities.parentTips: Bring a bag for collected treasures

activities.title: Dance party
activities.safetyNotes: Support baby's neck; avoid excessive spinning
activities.parentTips: Watch for overstimulation cues

activities.title: Mirror play
activities.parentTips: Start with short 2-minute sessions

activities.title: Soft toy parade
activities.description: Imaginative puppet show with stuffed animals
activities.parentTips: Keep stories simple with clear emotions

activities.title: Body parts song
activities.parentTips: Pause for baby to point to own body

activities.title: Kitchen drum set
activities.description: Sensory sound exploration with household items
activities.parentTips: Place on rug to muffle sound

activities.title: Cloud watching
activities.parentTips: Follow baby's gaze instead of directing

activities.title: Airplane baby
instructions: 1. Lie on back with knees bent
activities.parentTips: Make engine sounds for engagement

activities.title: Tickle game
activities.parentTips: Follow baby's cues for preferred spots

activities.title: Animal sounds
activities.parentTips: Start with animals baby knows from books

activities.title: Kissing game
activities.parentTips: Follow baby's cues for preferred touch

activities.title: Lap bounce
instructions: 1. Sit with baby facing outward on lap
activities.parentTips: Match bounce intensity to baby's mood

activities.title: Garden explorer
instructions: 2. Guide hands to touch safe plants
activities.safetyNotes: Avoid toxic plants; wash hands after
activities.parentTips: Focus on high-contrast flowers

activities.title: Pat-a-cake
instructions: 4. Finish with big hug on 'throw it in oven'
activities.parentTips: Slow motion for beginners

activities.title: This little piggy
activities.safetyNotes: Stop if baby pulls feet away
activities.parentTips: Build anticipation with pauses

activities.title: Baby yoga
activities.parentTips: Follow baby's natural range of motion

activities.title: Flying kisses
activities.parentTips: Use exaggerated facial expressions

activities.title: Nursery rhyme time
activities.parentTips: Repeat favorites for familiarity

activities.title: Up and down
activities.parentTips: Make eye contact during lifts

activities.title: Baby sign language
activities.parentTips: Be patient - may take weeks for response

activities.title: Stroller safari
activities.parentTips: Bring textured items for tactile input

activities.title: Color tour
instructions: 2. Point to objects of one color
activities.parentTips: Start with high-contrast colors (red/black)

activities.title: Tummy time fun
instructions: 1. Place baby on tummy on mat
2. Position high-contrast toy slightly out of reach
activities.parentTips: Place rolled towel under chest for support

activities.title: Baby book club
instructions: 1. Hold baby on lap facing book
activities.parentTips: Follow baby's interest - don't finish every page

activities.title: Silly face contest
activities.parentTips: Use mirror to help baby see expressions

activities.title: Baby dance party
activities.parentTips: Notice which rhythms baby prefers

activities.title: Where's baby?
activities.parentTips: Use translucent fabrics first

activities.title: Gentle baby exercises
activities.parentTips: Perfect for diaper change transitions

activities.title: Baby drumroll
instructions: 1. Gently drum fingers on baby's tummy
activities.parentTips: Watch for cues to adjust pressure

activities.title: Park bench people watching
instructions: 1. Sit on park bench with baby
activities.parentTips: Bring textured toys for tactile input

activities.title: Container play
activities.safetyNotes: All items must be larger than toilet paper tube
activities.parentTips: Rotate container types for novelty

activities.title: Texture walk
instructions: 1. Create safe path with varied surfaces
activities.parentTips: Check surfaces for splinters/rough edges

activities.title: Flashlight shadows
activities.parentTips: Use warm white light to reduce glare

activities.title: Laundry basket rides
activities.safetyNotes: Only on smooth surfaces; avoid tipping
activities.parentTips: Add soft blankets for comfort

activities.title: Pillow mountain climb
activities.description: Gross motor development on soft surfaces
activities.parentTips: Place non-slip mats under cushions

activities.title: Fabric tunnel crawl
activities.safetyNotes: Keep tunnel short with clear exit
activities.parentTips: Use sheer fabrics for beginners

activities.title: Follow the light
activities.parentTips: Use red light for less stimulating option

activities.title: Sock ball toss
activities.parentTips: Start with very short distances

activities.title: Shadow puppet show
activities.parentTips: Keep stories very short
variations: Use baby's hands to make shadows

activities.title: Mirror dancing
activities.parentTips: Use slow movements for easier tracking

activities.title: Cardboard box car
instructions: 4. Push gently while making engine sounds
activities.safetyNotes: Avoid small decorations that could detach
activities.parentTips: Add soft blankets for comfort inside

activities.title: Indoor "snowball" fight
activities.description: Tactile sensory play with soft objects
instructions: 3. Gently toss balls back and forth
activities.safetyNotes: Avoid face; use soft paper only
activities.parentTips: Start with slow-motion throws

activities.title: Parachute play
instructions: 2. Place baby in center on floor
activities.parentTips: Use sheer fabrics for visual tracking

activities.title: Sensory balance beam
activities.safetyNotes: Use painter's tape for easy removal
activities.parentTips: Make wide paths for beginners

activities.title: Family photo "reading"
activities.safetyNotes: Use board book format without small parts
activities.parentTips: Include pets and favorite toys in photos

activities.title: Cheek Stroking
activities.description: Gentle touch connection during cuddle time
instructions: 1. Sit comfortably with baby in your lap
2. Gently stroke their cheek with your fingertip
activities.parentTips: Follow baby's cues for pressure preference

activities.title: Breath Synchronizing
instructions: 3. Gently press baby's back with each exhale
activities.parentTips: Works best when baby is already calm

activities.title: Blinking Game
instructions: 2. Make eye contact and slowly blink
3. Wait for baby to blink back
activities.parentTips: Works best with babies 6+ months

activities.title: Sock Peekaboo
instructions: 4. Gently rub sock on baby's tummy
activities.parentTips: Use textured socks for extra interest

activities.title: Palm Tracing
instructions: 2. Slowly trace circles with your finger
activities.parentTips: Describe sensations ('soft', 'warm')

activities.title: Quiet Shaker
instructions: 1. Fill small bottle with 1/4 cup rice
activities.parentTips: Make multiple with different fillers

activities.title: Footsie Rhymes
activities.description: Gentle foot play with nursery rhymes
instructions: 1. Hold baby's feet while they lie down
activities.parentTips: Use whisper-voice for calm mood

activities.title: Scarf Float
instructions: 2. Let it float down onto them
3. Slowly pull scarf across their vision
activities.parentTips: Use high-contrast patterns for young babies

activities.title: Echo Whispers
instructions: 1. Hold baby close to your face
3. Wait for baby to vocalize back
activities.parentTips: Begin with vowel sounds for young infants

activities.title: Lap Bounces
instructions: 1. Sit baby facing outward on knees
activities.parentTips: Use calming motions when winding down

activities.title: Shadow Hands
instructions: 1. Sit near wall with lamp behind you
2. Make simple hand shapes on wall
activities.safetyNotes: Ensure lamp is cool and secure
activities.parentTips: Best for babies who can sit independently

activities.title: Texture Walk
activities.parentTips: Great for pre-walkers
variations: Use household items like bubble wrap

activities.title: Silent Puppets
instructions: 1. Place sock on hand as puppet
activities.parentTips: Use exaggerated facial expressions

activities.title: Hat Parade
instructions: 2. Gently place hats on your head
4. Briefly place hat on baby's head
activities.parentTips: Use hats with different textures

activities.title: Bottle Touch
instructions: 1. Prepare warm and cool water bottles
3. Gently touch baby's skin with each
activities.safetyNotes: Test temperatures on inner wrist first
activities.parentTips: Use mild temperature differences
